title: Auditing Firm Directory for Nonprofits
description:
A. SUMMARY
This dataset was created to support local nonprofit organizations seeking qualified and available auditors to perform their auditing work timely. Included in this dataset are accounting firm details on: 

1. The budget size of nonprofits the firms are interested in working with
2. Whether the firms have prior nonprofit auditing experience
3. The firms' ability to work on-site in San Francisco
4. The firms' ability to perform Single Audits for nonprofits receiving Federal funding
5. Additional types of services the firms provide in addition to auditing


B. HOW THE DATASET IS CREATED
The Controller’s Office surveyed over 400 local, state, and national accounting firms to develop this dataset, asking surveyed firms to provide details on their interest and history with conducting nonprofit financial audits. This dataset reflects verbatim the most recent survey responses; firms may not have answered all questions.


C. UPDATE PROCESS
The Controller's Office provides a live link to allow firms to submit new or updated data at any time. Approximately twice annually, the Controller's Office will refresh the posted dataset with new results submitted in the prior period. 


D. HOW TO USE THIS DATASET
Use this dataset to find accounting firms that meet your organization's needs. Please note nonprofit organizations are strongly encouraged to do further outreach and perform additional review of qualifications to confirm firms’ nonprofit auditing expertise and capacity. Nonprofit organizations are also encouraged to do additional research to identify accounting firms best suited for their organization’s needs.


E. RELATED DATASETS
Not applicable.

columns.name: data_as_of
columns.description: Timestamp when the record (row) was last updated in the source system. Said another way, this is how fresh this row of data is.

columns.name: data_loaded_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the record (row) was was last updated here (in the data portal)

columns.name: Date of last survey update
columns.description: Timestamp when the firm's information was last updated

columns.name: Firm name
columns.description: Legal, registered name of the firm and if applicable, the firm's assumed, trade, or fictitious name

columns.name: Firm license number
columns.description: Unique identifier assigned to the firm by the issuing authority

columns.name: Point of contact for inquiries
columns.description: Name of individual that can be approached to get more information on the firm

columns.name: Phone number for inquiries
columns.description: Phone number that can be used to get more information on the firm

columns.name: Email address for inquiries
columns.description: Email address that can be used to get more information on the firm

columns.name: Firm website
columns.description: Set of webpages that can be used to get more information on the firm

columns.name: Firm mailing address
columns.description: Physical location of the firm

columns.name: Number of years in operation
columns.description: Length of time the firm has been in operation

columns.name: Date of last peer review
columns.description: Date of the firm's last external review of their quality control system in accounting and auditing

columns.name: Has nonprofit auditing experience?
columns.description: Confirmation of the firm's prior nonprofit auditing experience

columns.name: Number of nonprofit financial audits completed within the last five years
columns.description: Number of nonprofit financial audits the firm has completed within the last five years

columns.name: Number of nonprofits audited within the last five years that received government funding
columns.description: Number of nonprofits the firm has audited within the last five years that received government funding

columns.name: Historical average time to completion for nonprofit financial audits completed within the last five years
columns.description: Historical average time to completion for nonprofit financial audits completed by the firm within the last five years

columns.name: Historical range of cost for a nonprofit financial audit completed within the last five years
columns.description: Historical range of cost for a nonprofit financial audit completed by the firm within the last five years

columns.name: Able to work on-site at locations in San Francisco, California?
columns.description: Information about whether the firm can work on site in San Francisco or perform audits remotely

columns.name: Able to perform a Single Audit?
columns.description: Confirmation of the firm's ability to conduct a Single Audit (i.e., an audit of a nonprofit organization that spends $1 million or more in Federal awards during a fiscal year)

columns.name: Scale of nonprofit financial audits the firm is interested in conducting
columns.description: Information about the budget size of nonprofits the firm will do business with, from below $1 million annually to above $2 million annually

columns.name: Additional services provided
columns.description: Additional services the firm is able to provide in addition to financial audits
